name: REC: Beyond The Lens
description:
A few years ago, in a small town, there lived an elderly lady who was always considered different by the locals. Rumors and superstitions gripped the community, attributing dark powers and mystical abilities to her. The old lady was labeled a witch.

Over time, his opinion deteriorated further. The community's fears and prejudices completely isolated her, and she found herself deprived of any meaningful human contact. Alone in her house of instruction, she found solace in solitude, though solitude allowed dark thoughts to take over her mind.

She then began to be carried away by demonic influences, exploring occult knowledge and practicing forbidden rituals. She succumbed to the darkness, fueled by the anger and bitterness that life had inflicted on her. Isolation and rejection resisted her for a self-destructive journey.

So, from that moment on, strange things had happened in that city, disappearances of young people and adults, without any explanation.

GAMEBILITY
Experience the terror in a small house using only a body camera and a flashlight.

AMBIENTATION
An intense journey, where the realistic setting and claustrophobic feel combine to create a unique experience

EXPLORATION
Investigate a small residence as supernatural events unfold.

GAME TIP

  • WASD - Default movement
  • [E] or [LMB] - Interaction
  • If the camera automatically moves to a specific point, try using the [E] key for interaction.
  • Try interacting with notes and making a linear path between kitchen and bathroom to advance in the game
  • Recommended to use graphics settings in HIGH, to give a better quality to the flashlight
  • 3 port attempts

THIS GAME WAS CREATED EXPERIMENTALLY, IT HAS A MINIMUM DURATION OF 10 TO 30 MINUTES

If at a certain point in the game the screen turns completely white, it means you have reached the end, just force exit the game
